item.title: DDS™: A Server Gameplay Module for Open-world MMO Game
item.description: OVERVIEW In order to enable game creators to build rich, large-scale multiplayer experiences where hundreds or even thousands of players can play together in new and dynamic virtual worlds, DDS is designed to be a networking module built for scale built to handle low-latency, high-volume, high-throughput data replication. It runs multiplayer networking as a separate server-side process, scaling to hundreds of millions of interactions a second – enabling thousands of players to join a single virtual world with increased levels of simulated content.
